name: GameTwist Online Casino Games
description:

Please note:
GameTwist is a provider of online games of chance that are offered exclusively for the purpose of entertainment. No money, items or services can be won at our games. The virtual currency “Twists” used in our games can be purchased in the in-app shop using real money. “Twists” cannot be exchanged for cash, transferred to other persons, be paid out in any form or converted into real items. They can only be used to play our games. These games are intended for adults only.
